size_type max_size() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Reports the maximum allocation size supported by the outer allocator, by calling {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;OuterAlloc&gt;::max_size(outer_allocator())}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The maximum allocation size for OuterAlloc.
